channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34219|2024-08-02T16:01:54.315Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05 improper permission checks allowed users without appropriate permissions to edit Build Configuration settings via REST API

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05 stored XSS in GitLab Connection page was possible

item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.3.1 headers containing authentication data could be added to the exception's message

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05.2 a token with limited permissions could be used to gain full account access

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05 stored XSS in the Show Connection page was possible

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05 open redirect during oAuth configuration was possible

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.03 reflected XSS was possible via Space connection configuration
